description:
Solid start, but incomplete software.

Game does not proceed to new level or menu after death, game hangs with enemy floating around. Using Linux Fedora 35.

No menu, no help screen, no tutorial or even quicktips on screen(I had to revisit download page for instructions). These are basics.

Would like:
Assignable controls
Less delay between completing areas and being able to move again after, (should be instant in high pressure situations).
Removal of need for spacebar (or shift) switching to take areas, it's unnecessary or should be able to be turned off.
Difficulty selector?
Agreed with the other review, not quite ready yet, seems to freeze after beating a level at times, not complete.
